body.section:
This project provides parsers for various file-formats that extract plain-text and metadata from an InputStream.
The API was designed with the following goals in mind:
simplicty
low memory consumption
no dependecy on specific technologies
The design of the API allows that the parser can be used in any project and not only for search-engines. The parser-service combines all available parsers to a solution that can be used out-of-the-box.
